name: Cash Dash (SupercraftD)
description:
The Bank has a lot of Cash, Cops, and Furniture!

Steal the cash, dodge the cops, and knock over furniture!

(now can be played on mobile)

-- Controls --

Movement: WASD / Arrow Keys

Dash: Shift / Space

-- Info --

1. Each bag has a random amount of cash in it

2. It takes at least 2 cops to arrest you

3. Cash bags spawn randomly every 2 seconds

4. Cops spawn randomly every 4 seconds

--------

Made for the SimpleJam#4 using the Godot game engine.

Furniture art by LimeZu, rest of the art by myself.

Music made by my friend.

All code is made by myself.

Thanks to MarcoFazio for the mobile joystick
